item.title: 最新消息：据当局称，一名 30 岁女性的尸体已被找到，她在加利福尼亚州沿海一日游徒步旅行后失踪四天：
item.description:
JUST IN: The body of a 30-year-old woman who went missing for four days after a day-trip hike in coastal California has been found, according to authorities.

Read more: https://t.co/moQ7Ha2J0N pic.twitter.com/vpAqlTaqke

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）宣布，前程万里（MileagePlus）会员现在可以使用一项新功能，在一个联名账户中最多与五人共享和合并里程，为夏季旅行计划提供了及时的帮助。
item.description:
United Airlines has announced MileagePlus members can now access a new feature to contribute and combine miles into one joint account with up to five people, just in time for summer travel planning. https://t.co/LmC4Kwzk3N

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 感觉幸运吗？在周二晚的抽奖中没有人中奖后，百万大奖的奖金已飙升至 9.77 亿美元。
item.description:
Feeling lucky?

The Mega Millions jackpot has surged to $977 million after no winners were selected in Tuesday night's drawing.

The next drawing is scheduled for Friday night. https://t.co/IAbjBOhxFs pic.twitter.com/hIb9EzMP5u

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 据美国国家航空航天局（NASA）称，从周日深夜到周一凌晨，将同时出现满月和所谓的 "微妙 "月食。
item.description:
There will be both a full moon and a so-called "subtle" lunar eclipse starting late Sunday night and into the early hours of Monday morning, according to NASA. https://t.co/d3CHq0x5eP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 美国职业棒球大联盟表示，已开始正式调查大谷翔平及其翻译水原一平的丑闻。
item.description:
Major League Baseball said it has begun formally investigating the scandal involving Shohei Ohtani and his interpreter, Ippei Mizuhara. https://t.co/BohZIaugOt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯周五发动了大规模空袭，乌克兰官员称这是自战争开始以来对其能源基础设施发动的规模最大、破坏性最强的袭击。
item.description:
Russia unleashed a massive aerial attack on Friday in what Ukrainian officials said was the largest and most destructive assault on its energy infrastructure since the start of the war. https://t.co/XjWkVJK80X pic.twitter.com/TCq3s5Gkkj

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 警方称，大学生莱利-斯特恩（Riley Strain）在纳什维尔几家酒吧夜游后失踪两周后，他的尸体在西纳什维尔的坎伯兰河中被打捞上来。周五晚上，他的家人在新闻发布会上发表了讲话。
item.description:
Two weeks after college student Riley Strain went missing after a night out at several Nashville bars, his body was recovered in the Cumberland River in West Nashville, police said. On Friday evening, his family spoke in a press conference. https://t.co/R08NvIKplS pic.twitter.com/teiUlNQAEg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 据俄罗斯外交部称，至少有 40 人死亡，100 多人受伤。

item.title: 2023 年星巴克假日礼品套装中销售的四种带金属涂层的陶瓷杯被召回，原因是有报告称容器过热或破裂，可能继续造成伤害。
item.description:
Four types of ceramic mugs with metallic coating sold in 2023 Starbucks Holiday gift sets have been recalled due to reports of the vessel overheating or breaking, which could continue to result in injury. https://t.co/XZCTbUXXyb

item.title: 专家说，拜登政府为什么要对付大科技公司？在法院开展的这场运动反映了两党对庞大的科技公司势力日益增长的担忧。
item.description:
Why is the Biden administration going after Big Tech?

The campaign in the courts reflects a growing bipartisan consensus concerned about the power of sprawling tech companies, experts said. https://t.co/Y4pSyIoc02

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯特在接受 "重大 "腹部手术两个月后，于上周五发布的一段视频中说，她被诊断出患有癌症，正在接受化疗。
item.description:
Kate, the Princess of Wales, was diagnosed with cancer and is undergoing chemotherapy, she said in a video message released on Friday, two months after she underwent "major" abdominal surgery. https://t.co/SjztVjyeKp pic.twitter.com/drSToQ3HDx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯特-米德尔顿（Kate Middleton）周五表示，她在接受腹部手术后被诊断出患有癌症，哈里王子和苏塞克斯公爵夫妇梅根在一份声明中祝愿凯特-米德尔顿及其家人 "健康和痊愈"。
item.description:
Prince Harry and Meghan, The Duke and Duchess of Sussex, wished "health and healing" for Kate Middleton and her family in a statement after the Princess of Wales said on Friday that she was diagnosed with cancer after undergoing abdominal surgery. https://t.co/DJeyOQQ5R1 pic.twitter.com/dE3HTrNUMJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 据联合国称，向70%面临 "灾难性饥饿 "的加沙人发放的援助有限。一名以色列军官说，问题不在于进入加沙的援助数量，而在于援助到达后的分配。
item.description:
Aid distribution to the 70% of Gazans facing "catastrophic hunger" has been limited, according to the UN.

The issue is less the amount of aid entering Gaza than the distribution of that aid once it arrives, an Israeli military official said. https://t.co/w6DBO6tUC2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据俄罗斯外交部称，莫斯科发生枪击和爆炸事件，造成至少 40 人死亡，100 多人受伤。
item.description:
BREAKING: At least 40 people were killed and over 100 others were injured in a shooting and explosion in Moscow, according to the Russian Foreign Security Service.

Russia's foreign ministry called the shooting and explosion a "terrorist attack." https://t.co/7beQctvbuC pic.twitter.com/gYEM36CpFU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 据一位专家称，凯特决定等到周五才公开宣布自己的癌症诊断结果，很可能是出于保护孩子的考虑。
item.description:
Kate's decision to wait until Friday to publicly announce her cancer diagnosis was likely made with a priority of protecting her children, according to an expert. https://t.co/j3nLTIyVJZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 罗马尼亚一家法院驳回了网络红人安德鲁-泰特（Andrew Tate）要求归还在案件调查期间被扣押资产的请求，他在该案中被控贩卖人口、强奸和组成犯罪团伙对妇女进行性剥削。
item.description:
A Romanian court denied a request by online influencer Andrew Tate to return assets that were seized during investigations into the case in which he is charged with human trafficking, rape and forming a criminal gang to sexually exploit women. https://t.co/zpIaX62C21

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 共和党众议员迈克-加拉格尔（Mike Gallagher）已宣布不再寻求连任，他宣布将于下月辞去国会职务，这将使共和党在众议院本已稀薄的多数席位进一步缩水。
item.description:
Republican Rep. Mike Gallagher, who had already announced he would not be seeking reelection, announced that he’s resigning from Congress next month — shrinking the Republicans' already razor-thin majority in the House. https://t.co/rqsDAnSXfA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统夸口说，美国的暴力犯罪已降至50年来的最低水平之一，但对一些美国人来说，对犯罪的看法却与统计数据相悖。
item.description:
Pres. Biden boasted that violent crime in the U.S. had plummeted to one of the lowest levels in 50 years — but for some Americans, the perception of crime is clashing with the statistics. https://t.co/OVsBC0uUwN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: "白宫新闻秘书卡琳-让-皮埃尔（Karine Jean-Pierre）周五在威尔士王妃凯特被诊断出患有癌症后说："在这个令人难以置信的艰难时刻，我们与剑桥公爵夫人及其家人和朋友同在。
item.description:
“Our thoughts are with the Duchess of Cambridge and her family members and friends during this incredibly difficult time,” White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre said on Friday after Kate, the Princess of Wales, said she was diagnosed with cancer. https://t.co/ePbpzhr4wU pic.twitter.com/fFxCThbt1B

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 在人们对威尔士王妃凯特的健康和福祉进行了数周的猜测之后，凯特宣布她被诊断出患有癌症：
item.description:
Kate, the Princess of Wales, announced she was diagnosed with cancer after weeks of speculation about her health and well-being.

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯特-米德尔顿（Kate Middleton）说，医生在她接受腹部手术后发现她患有癌症，目前她正在接受预防性化疗。

item.title: 在周二晚的抽奖中没有中奖者，百万大奖的奖金已飙升至 9.77 亿美元，这将是该游戏历史上第六大奖金。
item.description:
The Mega Millions jackpot has surged to $977 million after no winners were selected in Tuesday night's drawing — which would be the sixth largest prize in the game's history.

The next drawing is Friday night at 11 p.m. https://t.co/SRRZbfz4wH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024
